title: A prosthetic eye to treat blindness
description: At TEDMED, Sheila Nirenberg shows a bold way to create sight in people with certain kinds of blindness: by hooking into the optic nerve and sending signals from a camera direct to the brain.
author: Sheila Nirenberg
keywords: TED, talks, medical research, medicine, science, sight, technology, prosthetics, Senses, disability, biotech, engineering, innovation, code, neuroscience, Surgery, brain
